WorkItem.ClosedComment: Will be fixed for next release.
WorkItem.Description:
There seems to be an issue when trying to load priests from the Armoury and a NullReferenceException is being thrown in Rawr.Base - Unfortunately I don't have VS2008 any more and only have access to the express version so cant give you line numbers etc. 
 
Examples to try load from armoury:
Name: Jadeskye
Realm: Silvermoon(EU)
 
Name: Ærth
Realm: Silvermoon(EU)
 
Name: Balb
Realm: Silvermoon(EU)
